messages.content: I felt the same guilt when I stopped believing in [NAME]
I always move back and always regret it.
Sorry I dropped this /sノ( ゜-゜ノ)
Don’t regret the time, had it been sooner you might be absent a kid or three!
I’m sorry. Can you please explain what are the 2 accounts of the order of creation are contradictory?
They literally don’t have enough time on the planet to regret their actions.
Oh dear, I'm so sorry you are going through this. I don't have any sage advice but I hope things get better for you.
Just be honest with this person. Sorry I didn’t read the whole thing I don’t have time rn :(
I’m really sorry about your situation :( Although I love the names Sapphira, Cirilla, and Scarlett!
Sorry to be the bearer of bad tidings.
As a Ringwraith this offends me. Please build me a snowfort.
Unemployed now re: those crummy health issues. So that probably helped.
This.. im sorry but this is a dumb reply. Ofc it was fake kindness golly
I'm sorry that's what you read because it isn't what I said.
That sucks man, I'm sorry. Things will get better, they always do in the end
I’m sorry you have to deal with that
I’m more sorry that there are actual [NAME] fans...
You still didn’t answer the question. Sorry it’s bugging me :)
Sorry I forgot you guys beat Pitt. Congrats on your 2 win season.
Got it. Sorry you feel that way man. I hope you find your own way to impact the game or enjoy it next year.
Then I’m sorry but this game really isn’t for you. Progression like that would ruin the base of what this game is.
[NAME]: I'm sorry that happened. I hope you weren't totally friendless on your 30th!
Oh sorry my bad, didmt know
I have a bad feeling I’m gonna regret not tuning into this
I've always wanted one of those but like worry it'll make a huge mess in my washer
Sorry I'm a reddit noob but why do I get notifications of comments on my thread but then they disappear and I can't read them? Lol
>Sorry, but any city that had any kind of ~~epidemic in its~~ history will have bunches of dead people buried under it.
